last_episode_to_air.name: Romance Is Boring
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's the night of The Bad Weekends' big gig and the venue is a sell-out. Willow makes a decision he finds hard to break to Lauren and Ollie.

name: After Hours
overview: An 18 year old music lover who's just had his heart broken for the first time turns for support to an internet radio station on a long boat run by two people with extravagant personalities.

episodes.name: Young Jobless
episodes.overview: A music fan turns to a local radio show when his heart is broken for the first time.

episodes.name: Float On
episodes.overview: Willow is devastated when he discovers his best pal Chris has been burgled and his ex, Jasmine, has started dating a bass player. When his big moment to win her back arrives, Chris is badly in need of a friend. Will Willow make the right choice?

episodes.name: Formed A Band
episodes.overview: Lauren and Ollie try to cheer up a down-in-the dumps Willow by giving him the chance to co-present the show. But does it actually have any listeners?

episodes.name: Lonley Press Play
episodes.overview: Willow offers to abandon a night out with his old friends early to present the show.

episodes.name: Love Love Love
episodes.overview: With Lauren's ex-bandmate Russell back in Shankly, Willow and Ollie try to book the community centre for The Bad Weekends' concert. Meanwhile, Willow's spirits are raised when Jasmine splits up with new boyfriend Scott and comes to him for support.

episodes.name: Romance Is Boring
episodes.overview: It's the night of The Bad Weekends' big gig and the venue is a sell-out. Willow makes a decision he finds hard to break to Lauren and Ollie.
